title: Drawing, "Female Figure Among Clouds; Resurrection, Study after Panetti", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on heavy white wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: 36 Panetti Ferrara; at lower center: Gerolamo da Carpi Ferrara
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Left, Resurrection scene in desert landscape with mountains, plain, and few sparse trees. In upper center, Christ with very large halo stands on cloud; six putti surround him and two kneeling angels flank him. Right, the Madonna and Child in an oval.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Female Figure Among Clouds; Resurrection, Study after Panetti", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on heavy white wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3611-2.
